00101 class QicsDataModel: public QObject, public Qics {
00102     Q_OBJECT
00103 public:
00109     QicsDataModel(int num_rows = 0 , int num_cols = 0);
00110 
00114     virtual ~QicsDataModel(void);
00115 
00119     inline int numRows(void) const { return myNumRows; }
00120 
00124     inline int numColumns(void) const { return myNumColumns; }
00125         
00130     inline int lastRow(void) const { return (myNumRows - 1); }
00131 
00136     inline int lastColumn(void) const { return (myNumColumns - 1); }
00137 
00143     inline bool contains(int row, int col) const
00144     { return ((col > lastColumn() ||
00145            row > lastRow() ||
00146            row < 0 ||
00147            col < 0)?false: true );}
00148     
00169     virtual const QicsDataItem *item(int row, int col) const = 0;
00170 
00177     virtual QString itemString(int row, int col) const;
00178 
00185     const QicsDataItem *operator()(int row, int col) { return item(row, col); }
00186 
00192     virtual QicsDataModelRow rowItems(int row,
00193                       int first_col = 0,
00194                       int last_col = -1) const = 0;
00195 
00201     virtual QicsDataModelColumn columnItems(int col,
00202                         int first_row = 0,
00203                         int last_row = -1) const = 0;
00204 
00222     virtual void setRowItems(int row, const QicsDataModelRow &v) = 0;
00223 
00241     virtual void setColumnItems(int col, const QicsDataModelColumn &v) = 0;
00242     
00250     inline bool emitSignals(void) const { return myEmitSignalsFlag; }
00251         
00259     inline void setEmitSignals(bool b)  { myEmitSignalsFlag = b; }
